content: अंतर्हित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Placed between, separated, rendered invisible by interposition, hidden, concealed; अंतर्हिता शकुंतला वनराज्या <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; covered (with something else); अंतर्हिताशापथो जलदकाल इव <ls>K. 293</ls>; शेष्वानंतर्हितायां त्वं भूमौ <ls>Rām.</ls> uncovered or bare ground; पात्रेषु दर्भांतर्हितेषु अप आसिच्य <ls>Āśval.</ls>; अंतर्हिते आवां <ls>V. 2</ls>; अंतर्हिता यदि भवेद्वानिता न वेति <ls>Mk. 3. 4</ls> a disguised male, a female in male dress. {@--2@} Disappeared, vanished, become invisible; इति मंत्रयमाणः स्वयमंतर्हितः <ls>Ś. 4</ls> withdrew from sight, became invisible; अंतर्हिते शशिनि <ls>Ś. 4. 2</ls>; तस्यायमंतर्हितसौधभाजः <ls>R. 13. 40</ls> dwelling in a palace hidden under (the waters).
